original_title: Fresh Start for CIABOC: Justice Iddawala Takes Helm
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe has appointed Justice W. M. N. P. Iddawala as the Chairman of the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption.

In addition Chethiya Goonesekera & K. Bernard Rajapakse have been appointed as the as the other members of the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption with effect from 01st January 2024.
Thai PM Srettha Thavisin to Seal Landmark FTA with Sri Lanka in February
